amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Salaries and Expenses, General Administration of the Department of Justice by $1 million and increases funding for the Executive Office for Immigration Review by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Salaries and Expenses, General Administration of the Department of Justice by $1 million and to increase funding for Administrative Review and Appeals by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
